<S>2228</S> Know ye not<S>50</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, (for<S>1063</S> I speak<S>2980</S> to them that know<S>1097</S> the law<S>3551</S>,) how that<S>3754</S> the law<S>3551</S> hath dominion over<S>2961</S> a man<S>444</S> as long as<S>1909</S> <S>3745</S> <S>5550</S> he liveth<S>2198</S>?
For<S>1063</S> the woman<S>1135</S> which hath an husband<S>5220</S> is bound<S>1210</S> by the law<S>3551</S> to her husband<S>435</S> so long as he liveth<S>2198</S>; but<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> the husband<S>435</S> be dead<S>599</S>, she is loosed<S>2673</S> from<S>575</S> the law<S>3551</S> of her husband<S>435</S>.
So then<S>686</S> <S>3767</S> if<S>1437</S>, while her husband<S>435</S> liveth<S>2198</S>, she be married<S>1096</S> to another<S>2087</S> man<S>435</S>, she shall be called<S>5537</S> an adulteress<S>3428</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> her husband<S>435</S> be dead<S>599</S>, she is<S>2076</S> free<S>1658</S> from<S>575</S> that law<S>3551</S>; so that she<S>846</S> is<S>1511</S> no<S>3361</S> adulteress<S>3428</S>, though she be married<S>1096</S> to another<S>2087</S> man<S>435</S>.
Wherefore<S>5620</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> are become dead<S>2289</S> to the law<S>3551</S> by<S>1223</S> the body<S>4983</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>; that<S>1519</S> ye<S>5209</S> should be married<S>1096</S> to another<S>2087</S>, even to him who is raised<S>1453</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, that<S>2443</S> we should bring forth fruit<S>2592</S> unto God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> when<S>3753</S> we were<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, the motions<S>3804</S> of sins<S>266</S>, which<S>3588</S> were by<S>1223</S> the law<S>3551</S>, did work<S>1754</S> in<S>1722</S> our<S>2257</S> members<S>3196</S> to bring<S>1519</S> forth fruit<S>2592</S> unto death<S>2288</S>. <sup>motions: Gr. passions</sup>
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> we are delivered<S>2673</S> from<S>575</S> the law<S>3551</S>, that being dead<S>599</S> <S>599</S> wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> we were held<S>2722</S>; that<S>5620</S> we<S>2248</S> should serve<S>1398</S> in<S>1722</S> newness<S>2538</S> of spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> in the oldness<S>3821</S> of the letter<S>1121</S>. <sup>that being: or, being dead to that</sup>
What<S>5101</S> shall we say<S>2046</S> then<S>3767</S>? Is the law<S>3551</S> sin<S>266</S>? God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>. Nay<S>235</S>, I had<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> known<S>1097</S> sin<S>266</S>, but<S>1508</S> by<S>1223</S> the law<S>3551</S>: for<S>1063</S> <S>5037</S> I had<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> known<S>1492</S> lust<S>1939</S>, except<S>1508</S> the law<S>3551</S> had said<S>3004</S>, Thou shalt<S>1937</S> not<S>3756</S> covet<S>1937</S>. <sup>lust: or, concupiscence</sup>
But<S>1161</S> sin<S>266</S>, taking<S>2983</S> occasion<S>874</S> by<S>1223</S> the commandment<S>1785</S>, wrought<S>2716</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S> all manner of<S>3956</S> concupiscence<S>1939</S>. For<S>1063</S> without<S>5565</S> the law<S>3551</S> sin<S>266</S> was dead<S>3498</S>.
For<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> was alive<S>2198</S> without<S>5565</S> the law<S>3551</S> once<S>4218</S>: but<S>1161</S> when the commandment<S>1785</S> came<S>2064</S>, sin<S>266</S> revived<S>326</S>, and<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> died<S>599</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the commandment<S>1785</S>, which<S>3588</S> was ordained to<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>, I<S>3427</S> found<S>2147</S> <S>3778</S> to be unto<S>1519</S> death<S>2288</S>.
For<S>1063</S> sin<S>266</S>, taking<S>2983</S> occasion<S>874</S> by<S>1223</S> the commandment<S>1785</S>, deceived<S>1818</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> by<S>1223</S> it<S>846</S> slew<S>615</S> me.
Wherefore<S>5620</S> <S>3303</S> the law<S>3551</S> is holy<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> the commandment<S>1785</S> holy<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> just<S>1342</S>, and<S>2532</S> good<S>18</S>.
Was then<S>3767</S> that which is good<S>18</S> made<S>1096</S> death<S>2288</S> unto me<S>1698</S>? God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>. But<S>235</S> sin<S>266</S>, that<S>2443</S> it might appear<S>5316</S> sin<S>266</S>, working<S>2716</S> death<S>2288</S> in me<S>3427</S> by<S>1223</S> that which is good<S>18</S>; that<S>2443</S> sin<S>266</S> by<S>1223</S> the commandment<S>1785</S> might become<S>1096</S> exceeding<S>2596</S> <S>5236</S> sinful<S>268</S>.
For<S>1063</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> the law<S>3551</S> is<S>2076</S> spiritual<S>4152</S>: but<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> carnal<S>4559</S>, sold<S>4097</S> under<S>5259</S> sin<S>266</S>.
For<S>1063</S> that which<S>3739</S> I do<S>2716</S> I allow<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S>: for<S>1063</S> what<S>3739</S> I would<S>2309</S>, that<S>5124</S> do I<S>4238</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>235</S> what<S>3739</S> I hate<S>3404</S>, that<S>5124</S> do I<S>4160</S>. <sup>allow: Gr. know</sup>
If<S>1487</S> then<S>1161</S> I do<S>4160</S> that<S>5124</S> which<S>3739</S> I would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>, I consent<S>4852</S> unto the law<S>3551</S> that<S>3754</S> it is good<S>2570</S>.
Now<S>3570</S> then<S>1161</S> it is no more<S>3765</S> I<S>1473</S> that do<S>2716</S> it<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> sin<S>266</S> that dwelleth<S>3611</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S> (that is<S>5123</S>, in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> flesh<S>4561</S>,) dwelleth<S>3611</S> no<S>3756</S> good thing<S>18</S>: for<S>1063</S> to will<S>2309</S> is present<S>3873</S> with me<S>3427</S>; but<S>1161</S> how to perform<S>2716</S> that which is good<S>2570</S> I find<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S>.
For<S>1063</S> <S>3739</S> the good<S>18</S> that I would<S>2309</S> I do<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S>: but<S>235</S> the evil<S>2556</S> which<S>3739</S> I would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>, that<S>5124</S> I do<S>4238</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> <S>3739</S> I do<S>4160</S> that<S>5124</S> I<S>1473</S> would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>, it is no more<S>2089</S> <S>3765</S> I<S>1473</S> that do<S>2716</S> it<S>846</S>, but<S>235</S> sin<S>266</S> that dwelleth<S>3611</S> in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>.
I find<S>2147</S> then<S>686</S> a law<S>3551</S>, that<S>3754</S>, when I<S>1698</S> would<S>2309</S> do<S>4160</S> good<S>2570</S>, evil<S>2556</S> is present<S>3873</S> with me<S>1698</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I delight<S>4913</S> in the law<S>3551</S> of God<S>2316</S> after<S>2596</S> the inward<S>2080</S> man<S>444</S>:
But<S>1161</S> I see<S>991</S> another<S>2087</S> law<S>3551</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> members<S>3196</S>, warring against<S>497</S> the law<S>3551</S> of my<S>3450</S> mind<S>3563</S>, and<S>2532</S> bringing<S>163</S> me<S>3165</S> into captivity<S>163</S> to the law<S>3551</S> of sin<S>266</S> which<S>3588</S> is<S>5607</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> members<S>3196</S>.
O wretched<S>5005</S> man<S>444</S> that I am<S>1473</S>! who<S>5101</S> shall deliver<S>4506</S> me<S>3165</S> from<S>1537</S> the body<S>4983</S> of this<S>5127</S> death<S>2288</S>? <sup>the body: or, this body of death</sup>
I thank<S>2168</S> God<S>2316</S> through<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S>. So then<S>686</S> <S>3767</S> with the mind<S>3563</S> I<S>1473</S> myself<S>846</S> serve<S>3303</S> <S>1398</S> the law<S>3551</S> of God<S>2316</S>; but<S>1161</S> with the flesh<S>4561</S> the law<S>3551</S> of sin<S>266</S>.
